sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

to April 4

2026. Minimal redemptions left about $4.8 million in trust and over two million shares outstanding. Looking for the best stocks to buy? Follow the recommendations of top-performing analysts . Claim 70% Off TipRanks This Holiday Season Unlock hedge-fund level data and powerful investing tools for smarter
sharper decisions Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential AlphaTime Acquisition Corp. ((ATMC)) just unveiled an update. On December 16–17

AlphaTime Acquisition Corp. obtained shareholder approval to amend both its Investment Management Trust Agreement and its charter to extend the deadline for completing a business combination beyond the original January 4
2026 termination date. The new structure allows up to three one‑month extensions
potentially pushing the deadline to April 4
contingent on the company providing advance notice to the trustee and making a nominal $1 deposit into the trust account for each monthly extension in exchange for a non‑interest‑bearing
unsecured promissory note. All proposals put to vote at the December 16
2025 extraordinary general meeting
including the extension amendments and an adjournment proposal
passed with a significant majority of votes cast
while redemptions were minimal
with holders of only 69 ordinary shares electing to redeem
removing about $854 from the trust account and leaving roughly $4.8 million and 2
476 ordinary shares outstanding. The approvals effectively give AlphaTime additional time and financial flexibility to secure a business combination while preserving most of the capital in trust

which is a key consideration for remaining shareholders and potential merger targets. More about AlphaTime Acquisition Corp. AlphaTime Acquisition Corp. Is a special purpose acquisition company (SPAC) formed to consummate a business combination
holding investors’ funds in a trust account while it seeks a suitable target to merge with and take public. Average Trading Volume: 34
419 Technical Sentiment Signal: Buy For detailed information about ATMC stock

TipRanks Auto-Generated Newsdesk
feed.summary: AlphaTime Acquisition Corp. (ATMC) shareholders have approved an extension to the company's business combination deadline, pushing it to April 4, 2026. This extension, which allows for up to three one-month increments, was granted with minimal redemptions, preserving approximately $4.8 million in the trust account and 2,169,476 ordinary shares outstanding. The move provides AlphaTime with increased time and financial flexibility to pursue a merger target.

feed.title: What's Going On With AlphaTime Acquisition (ATMC) Stock Tuesday?
authors: Benzinga News
feed.summary: AlphaTime Acquisition Corp. (NASDAQ: ATMC) shares are trading significantly higher after shareholders approved its merger agreement with HCYC Group. This surge is likely driven by increased attention on low-float SPACs following the Dec. 5 extraordinary general meeting where shareholders approved the merger, dated Jan. 5, 2024, and amended Aug. 19, 2024. ATMC stock was up 358.46% at $71.52 at the time of the article's writing.

feed.title: AlphaTime and HCYC announce effective registration for merger By Investing.com
authors: NULL
feed.summary: AlphaTime Acquisition Corp (NASDAQ:ATMC) and HCYC Holding Company have announced that their registration statement for a business combination has become effective. Following the merger, the combined entity will operate as HCYC Holding Company and plans to list its ordinary shares on NASDAQ under the ticker "HCYC." HCYC operates through its subsidiary, HCYC Wealth Management (ASIA) Company Limited, an insurance brokerage in Hong Kong.

feed.title: AlphaTime Acquisition Corp's Registration Statement for Business Combination with HCYC Holding Company Becomes Effective
authors: NULL
feed.summary: AlphaTime Acquisition Corp (ATMC) and HCYC Holding Company announced that their registration statement for a business combination has become effective. Upon closing, the combined entity will be named HCYC Holding Company and will list its shares on NASDAQ under the ticker 'HCYC'. The registration statement provides details for the upcoming shareholder vote, and HCYC will continue to operate as an insurance brokerage in Hong Kong.

feed.title: AlphaTime Acquisition Corp's Registration Statement for Business Combination with HCYC Holding Company Becomes Effective
authors: NULL
feed.summary: AlphaTime Acquisition Corp and HCYC Holding Company announced that their registration statement for a proposed business combination has become effective. The combined company will operate as HCYC Holding Company and list on NASDAQ under the ticker 'HCYC'. HCYC is an established insurance brokerage in Hong Kong, and the effective registration marks a key step towards completing the merger.

feed.title: AlphaTime Acquisition Corp and HCYC Holding Company Announce Effectiveness of Registration Statement
authors: NULL
feed.summary: AlphaTime Acquisition Corp (NASDAQ: ATMC) and HCYC Holding Company announced that the registration statement for their proposed business combination has become effective. Upon closing, the combined entity will operate as HCYC Holding Company and list its ordinary shares on NASDAQ under the ticker symbol 'HCYC'. The registration statement, which includes a proxy statement/prospectus, details the business combination and related shareholder vote, and is accessible on the SEC website.

feed.title: ALPHATIME ACQUISITION CORP SEC 10-Q Report
authors: NULL
feed.summary: AlphaTime Acquisition Corp (ATMC) has released its Form 10-Q report for the third quarter of 2025, detailing its financial performance and ongoing efforts to complete an initial business combination. The company, a blank check acquisition entity, reported a net income of $165,713 for the three months ended September 30, 2025, primarily from investments in its Trust Account, but faces liquidity challenges and has extended its acquisition timeline multiple times. A merger agreement with HCYC Group Company Limited is pending shareholder approval, and the company acknowledges substantial doubt about its ability to continue as a going concern due to financial resource constraints.

feed.title: AlphaTime Acquisition announces $11.5 million PIPE financing in connection with business combination
authors: Investing.com
feed.summary: AlphaTime Acquisition Corp (NASDAQ:ATMC) has announced an $11.5 million PIPE financing through agreements with accredited investors for ordinary shares and warrants. This financing is tied to its business combination with HCYC Group Company Limited. The company's financial health is rated as FAIR by InvestingPro, with concerns about short-term obligations.

feed.title: AlphaTime Acquisition Corp (ATMC) reports earnings
authors: Quartz Intelligence Newsroom
feed.summary: AlphaTime Acquisition Corp (ATMC) has filed its 10-Q report for the quarter ended September 30, 2024, reporting a net income of $404,367 for the quarter and $1,232,002 for the nine months. The company faces a working capital deficit and a material weakness in internal controls, while continuing to work towards a business combination with HCYC Group Company Limited, with a deadline extended to December 4, 2024.

feed.title: AlphaTime Acquisition Corp Announces Entering into a Merger Agreement with HCYC Group Company Limited
feed.summary: AlphaTime Acquisition Corp (ATMC) has announced a definitive merger agreement with HCYC Group Company Limited, an insurance brokerage operating through its subsidiary HCYC Wealth Management (ASIA) Company Limited in Hong Kong. The transaction, valued at $75,000,000, involves HCYC shareholders receiving 7,500,000 ordinary shares of PubCo, with PubCo expected to become a NASDAQ-listed public company. The merger is anticipated to close in early 2024, subject to regulatory and shareholder approvals.
